Title: Future challenges of the impact agenda
Source: Appl. Linguistics: Language and the Impact Agenda
Abstract: © 2018 selection and editorial matter, Dan McIntyre and Hazel Price; individual chapters, the contributors.This afterword briefly summarises the insights arising from the book’s constituent chapters, as well as looking forwards to what future challenges might lie in store for the discipline of linguistics in relation to the impact agenda.
